survey_name: Urban Green Space Usage and Preferences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how residents use and perceive urban green spaces, such as parks and gardens, to improve their design and accessibility.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit urban green spaces (e.g., parks, gardens)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency accurately. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How often do you visit urban green spaces (e.g., parks, gardens)?

questions.question_text: What activities do you typically engage in when visiting urban green spaces? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who visit urban green spaces at least 'A few times a year' (Q1).
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture diverse activities. Include an 'Other' option for completeness.

script.question_text: What activities do you typically engage in when visiting urban green spaces? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who visit urban green spaces at least 'A few times a year' (Q1).

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of urban green spaces? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who visit urban green spaces at least 'A few times a year' (Q1).
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question type or a follow-up single-choice question for each factor. Ensure clarity in instructions.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: ranking question (or single-choice per factor if ranking is unsupported).

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of urban green spaces? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who visit urban green spaces at least 'A few times a year' (Q1).

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current quality and maintenance of urban green spaces in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure balanced options.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current quality and maintenance of urban green spaces in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in urban green spaces?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length if necessary.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in urban green spaces?
